project_info.name: MPA_website
project_info.description: Malaysia Proptech Association Website - WordPress with The7 Theme

daily_workflow.description: Standard workflow for making changes to the website

steps.description: Edit WordPress files, themes, plugins, or content
Commit changes with a descriptive message
Push changes to the backup repository

status.description: Check what files have been modified, added, or deleted

log.description: View commit history in a compact format

example_commit_messages: Fixed menu spacing and alignment issues
Added new plugin and configured settings

common_issues.solution: Use sudo for file operations or check file permissions
Ensure you're in the correct directory (/var/www/html)
Pull latest changes first: git pull origin main
Check .gitignore to exclude large media files

backup_information.restore_instructions: Clone from backup location to restore website

important: wp-config.php is excluded from version control for security
Upload directories are excluded to prevent large file commits
Log files are excluded to keep repository clean
Always use descriptive commit messages for tracking changes

regular_tasks: Check git status before making changes
Commit changes frequently with clear messages
Keep commit history clean and organized
Backup database separately from file changes
